dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT (CASE WHEN NOT :R_START_DATE IS NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) rec_date, (CASE WHEN NOT :D_START_DATE IS NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) due_date, :R_START_DATE rec_start_date, :R_END_DATE rec_end_date, :D_START_DATE due_start_date, :D_END_DATE due_end_date FROM DUAL

SELECT DISTINCT inv.insert_date, invref1.invoice_refnum_value loc_num, glog_util.remove_domain(inv.servprov_gid) carrier_id, invref2.invoice_refnum_value shipment_id, sref1.shipment_refnum_value booking_no, sref2.shipment_refnum_value bill_lading_no, inv.invoice_number invoice_no, sh.total_ship_unit_count containers, sref3.shipment_refnum_value per_container, TRIM(TO_CHAR(inv.net_amount_base,'999,999,990.00')) total_amount, TO_CHAR(inv.net_due_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') due_date, TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(inv.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YYYY') date_received, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(vouch.invoice_gid) FROM voucher vouch WHERE vouch.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid) > 0 THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END) approved, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(vouch.invoice_gid) FROM voucher vouch WHERE vouch.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid AND vouch.was_auto_approved = 'Y') > 0 THEN 'YES' ELSE (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(vouch.invoice_gid) FROM voucher vouch WHERE vouch.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid AND vouch.was_auto_approved = 'Y') = 0 AND (SELECT COUNT(vouch.invoice_gid) FROM voucher vouch WHERE vouch.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid AND vouch.was_auto_approved = 'N') > 0 THEN 'NO' ELSE '' END) END) auto_approved FROM invoice inv LEFT OUTER JOIN invoice_refnum invref1 ON inv.invoice_gid = invref1.invoice_gid AND invref1.invoice_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN invoice_refnum invref2 ON inv.invoice_gid = invref2.invoice_gid AND invref2.invoice_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.SHIPMENT ID' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment sh ON 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || invref2.invoice_refnum_value = sh.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON sh.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON sh.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.BILL OF LADING NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON sh.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COST PER CONTAINER' WHERE inv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND inv.invoice_source = 'I' AND (:R_START_DATE IS NULL OR (NOT :R_START_DATE IS NULL AND (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(inv.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY') >= TO_DATE(:R_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(inv.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY') <= TO_DATE(NVL(:R_END_DATE,:R_START_DATE),'YYYY-MM-DD')))) AND (:D_START_DATE IS NULL OR (NOT :D_START_DATE IS NULL AND (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(inv.net_due_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY') >= TO_DATE(:D_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(inv.net_due_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY') <= TO_DATE(NVL(:D_END_DATE,:D_START_DATE),'YYYY-MM-DD')))) AND (:SERVPROV_ID IS NULL OR (NOT :SERVPROV_ID IS NULL AND inv.servprov_gid = :SERVPROV_ID)) AND (:AUTO_APPROVE_IND = 'BOTH' OR (:AUTO_APPROVE_IND = 'YES' AND (SELECT COUNT(vouch.invoice_gid) FROM voucher vouch WHERE vouch.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid AND vouch.was_auto_approved = 'Y') > 0) OR (:AUTO_APPROVE_IND = 'NO' AND (((SELECT COUNT(vouch.invoice_gid) FROM voucher vouch WHERE vouch.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid AND vouch.was_auto_approved = 'Y') = 0 AND (SELECT COUNT(vouch.invoice_gid) FROM voucher vouch WHERE vouch.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid AND vouch.was_auto_approved = 'N') > 0) OR (SELECT COUNT(vouch.invoice_gid) FROM voucher vouch WHERE vouch.invoice_gid = inv.invoice_gid) = 0))) ORDER BY inv.insert_date DESC
